isis.stitle: DT/DTA-466 Diesel Engine Service (1990) - CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES - COMPONENT CHANGES - Service Procedure

svcproc.title: Service Procedure

step1.para: ROTATOR ASSEMBLY (Intake & Exhaust): A new designed rotator assembly, P/N 1 815 299 C1, is released for 1990 model year.

svcproc.para:
New designed rotator assembly differs from rotator assembly, P/N 1 811 581 C91, used on 1989 model year engines in that oil seal shield portion of rotator is eliminated. Refer to Figure 4.4
.

step1.para: VALVE STEM SEAL ASSEMBLY: A new valve stem seal assembly, P/N 1 815 374 C1 (Intake) and P/N 1 815 375 C1 (Exhaust), is added to 1990 model year engines for better oil control down the valve stems vs. the previous oil seal removed from the rotator assembly, as stated above.

New valve stem seal assembly features an integral stem seal and spring seat ( Figure 4.5
).

figure.caption: Figure 4.5. Valve Stem Seal Assembly, P/N 1 815 374 C1 (Intake), 1 815 375 C1 (Exhaust) and Valve Spring Seat, P/N 675 443 R1, Comparison.

step1.para:
VALVE SPRING SEAT (Intake & Exhaust): With the introduction of new valve stem seal assembly, P/N 1 815 374 C1 (Intake) and 1 815 375 C1 (Exhaust), as outlined above; valve spring seat, P/N 675 443 C1, used on 1989 model year engines is now eliminated on 1990 model year engines. Refer to Figure 4.5
.
CYLINDER HEAD ASSEMBLY: Cylinder head assembly, P/N 1 815 395 C91, containing new shorter valve guides is released for 1990 model year.

VALVE GUIDES (Intake & Exhaust): New shorter length valve guides, P/N 1 815 264 C1, are released for 1990 model year ( Figure 4.6
).
New shorter valve guides measure 2.610 inches in length compared to 1989 model year valve guides, P/N 675 439 C1, which measure 2.750 inches in length.
The reduction in length is to allow clearance between the new valve stem seal assembly and the rotator.

note.para: DO NOT USE NEW SHORTER VALVE GUIDE (P/N 1 815 264 C1) FOR SERVICE ON 1989 MODEL YEAR OR PRIOR MODEL YEARS (PRIOR TO S/N 594858) DT/DTA-466 DIESEL ENGINES AS INTERFERENCE TO ENGINE WILL OCCUR. MEASURE VALVE GUIDE TO VERIFY LENGTH.

step1.para: INTAKE VALVES: 1989 model year intake valve, P/N 675 046 C2, is replaced on 1990 model year engines with a new intake valve having a flash chrome plated valve stem to improve valve life. Valve P/N is advanced to 675 046 C3.

EXHAUST VALVES: 1989 model year exhaust valve, P/N 676 865 C3, is replaced on 1990 model year engines with a new exhaust valve having a flash chrome plated valve stem and tapered in the stem area. Valve P/N is advanced to 676 865 C4. Refer to Figure 4.7
.
